products.title: Stirlo Oyster Cream
products.metadescription: Made to measure stirlo oyster cream roller blind | privacy, dim-out fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlooyster cream plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.
